subject: RE: [junit] Re: Help plz...

messageBody:
Jim Dixon [mailto:jdd@...] wrote:
> Walter [...] would reformat each and
> every line, and then shrink it and shrink it again -- days
> passed -- until it was tiny, jewel-like, usually
> incomprehensible, and worked flawlessly.

Whatever you do, don't let Walter find out about APL.
